_sText:
Counter-Strike: Source : Bot's Navigation Mesh for the map DE_PASTA_CSS


Nav Creator: Meurglis3, Release Date: July 25 2014

Here is the Navigation Mesh for nice fast-paced map [de_pasta_css](http://css.gamebanana.com/maps/181835) by unknown author (released April 2009).
It's a created from scratch and manually optimized .nav-file (because in original mapauthor's release .nav-file was not present).

Well... bots use all possible ways now and they are always ready to treat guests with firm Sicilian pizza... full of lead :D

Also this Navigation Mesh is fully Place Named.

Play and Enjoy! All your responses and remarks are always welcomed ;-)

Credits and Gratitudes:
   plus. (for redistribution this nice remake at GameBanana),
   unknown author (for his fine CSS-portation of old good CS 1.6 map),
   -Stratesiz- (for his original CS 1.6 map de_pasta).

Additional Gratitudes:
   BarnDoor (for perfect playable navigation meshes for many fine CS:S maps),
   Chizbone (for informative and clever article BOT_BRAINED and a set of excellent navigation meshes),
   CoCoNUT (for fine hand-tuned navigation meshes for many fine CS:S maps),
   Valve Developer Community (for learning articles by Navigation Meshes and Navigation Mesh Commands).

La cosa nostra Ã¨ immortale! :-)
